content.html: Thinking of the time Elon publicly fired an Android engineer for saying that the app was slow because of technical debt and a full rewrite is needed to address perf problems. 3 months on, Elon himself proposes a full rewrite himself, because a config change caused an outage. ðŸ˜…
content.value:
Thinking of the time Elon publicly fired an Android engineer for saying that the app was slow because of technical debt and a full rewrite is needed to address perf problems.

3 months on, Elon himself proposes a full rewrite himself, because a config change caused an outage. ðŸ˜…
